about_the_game:
As we're offering the rerelease of Socrates Jones: Pro Philosopher for free, we're putting the soundtrack out there for anyone who wishes to "tip the devs." The soundtrack contains the original renders of all tracks from the game.

Players have repeatedly praised the Socrates Jones: Pro Philosopher soundtrack. It's got some sick bops, they said. Great music for all those times you're in a debate and wanna really drive your point home.

Theoretically, some of them might have even said: "I know it's available to stream, but I'd love to pay 5 dollars to have those MP3s sitting on my very own drive!" And who are we to deny these theoretical desires?
